topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.1: Troubleshooting ESX and OVSvApp

body.p: HPE Helion OpenStack is an OpenStack technology coupled with a version of Linux provided by HP. This topic describes all the known issues that you might encounter. To help you resolve these issues, we have provided possible solutions.

li.xref: nova-manage service list does not list the compute service as running
Unable to login to vCenter proxy agent

section.title: nova-manage service list does not list the compute service as running
section.p: There can be multiple reason why nova-compute service is not listed or has a :) as status.
To resolve the above issue verify the following:

ol.li: The ESX Management Network is able to reach the Helion Management Network.

section.title: Unable to login to vCenter proxy agent
section.p: Unable to login to vCenter proxy agent through the console.
Users can login to the system using the user heat-admin and the authorized key in the Seed VM.

section.title: Failure of OVSvAPP deployment
section.p: Verify tripleo/hp-ovsvapp/log/ovs_vapp.log in the installer directory.
